title: Great job riot, Great job...
body: I was playin on my alt acc and I get a pop up telling me ' you no connected' and so i get a penalty. how nice. great job rito. I had this exact problem 2 years ago and seeing how it is occuring again gives me great confidence on how hard u guys are working.

replies.body: dont blame rito for your trash internet lol

Sometimes that can happen if your network gets's out of sync with the game servers. Double check that your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) are still setup correctly for League to have a solid connection.
